Site.Description: City of Langley Internal Web Mapping Application

Layer.Name: Water Mains
Sanitary Mains

FeatureHyperlink.ToolTip: View CCTV for {PIPE DIAMETER} {MATERIAL} sanitary main {GIS_LINK}
View CCTV report for {PIPE DIAMETER} {MATERIAL} sanitary main {GIS_LINK}
View drawing for fibre optic line

Layer.DisplayName: Application Zone for Flood Construction Level
Layer.Name: Application Zone for Flood Construction Level
Property

DataLink.Command:
SELECT (CASE WHEN UNIT IS NULL THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(INTEGER,HOUSE)) + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,STREET) ELSE
CONVERT(VARCHAR,UNIT) + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(INTEGER,HOUSE)) + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,STREET) END) AS
FULL_CIVIC, CONVERT(INTEGER,HOUSE) AS HOUSE_NUM, STREET, UNIT, CITY, PROVINCE, POSTAL_CODE, PLAN_NUMBER, LOT, PID,
FOLIO, LEGAL_TYPE, PROPERTY_NUMBER, GISLINK, LEGAL_ID, 'http://col-gis.col.local/LegalPlans/' + PLAN_NUMBER + '.tif' AS LEGAL_PLAN FROM TempestLive.dbo.LAND_LEGAL WHERE TempestLive.dbo.LAND_LEGAL.GISLINK = @PIDfromLayer ORDER BY (CASE WHEN
LEGAL_TYPE = 'LAND' THEN 0 WHEN LEGAL_TYPE = 'STRATA' THEN 1 WHEN LEGAL_TYPE = 'ALIAS' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END), UNIT

SearchTable.Command: SELECT LEGAL_ID, PROPERTY_NUMBER, FOLIO, PID, PLAN_NUMBER, LOT, GISLINK, STREET, HOUSE, UNIT, CITY, PROVINCE, POSTAL_CODE FROM TempestLive.dbo.LAND_LEGAL
